title: Mary Berry faces backlash as leek and potato pie is branded 'casserole with a lid'
text:
Mary Berry faces backlash as leek and potato pie is branded ‘casserole with a lid’ 
Some viewers were not impressed with what the former Bake Off judge considered to be a pie Wednesday 22 March 2017 09:54 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Controversial: Mary Berry makes a pie without a base BBC 
Mary Berry has faced new criticism over another one her ‘classic’ recipes on her BBC2 cookery show. 
Viewers were left less than impressed with her take on a leek and potato pie during this week’s episode of Mary Berry Everyday, with many branding it a ‘casserole with a lid’. 
A number of cookery fans decided to vent their frustration on Twitter, refusing to accept that Berry has actually made a pie as it had no base. 
“That's a pastry lid - not a pie. You're going to give Twitter a meltdown. Disgraceful. #maryberryeveryday,” wrote one outraged viewer. Mary says she's making a pie. That had better not be a casserole with a lid Mary, I'm watching you. #piesnotlies #maryberryeveryday — Matt Flye (@MattFlye) March 20, 2017 That's a pastry lid - not a pie. You're going to give Twitter a meltdown. Disgraceful. #maryberryeveryday
